question: Write expalanation letter for visa
text: Sub - Explanation for Proof of Funds

I, Prachi Vipulbhai Goyani received a letter of acceptance (LOA) from the University of Guelph for my Master of Arts in French Studies. The letter reveals that I have been accepted as a student for the fall semester starting on September 8th, 2022.
To be eligible to apply for a study permit, I need to fulfil the following criteria:
1.  Proof of acceptance- Proof of acceptance from DLI
I have attached the LOA from the University of Guelph, which is a DLI # O19305391192.

2. Proof of Identity- Valid passport as a proof of Identity. I have uploaded  my passport which shows Mauritius Citizenship because of this I am not able to take benefit of SDS Scheme and hence although my IELTS score (L-8 , R- 8.5, W- 7.0 , S-8.0 , Overall – 8.0) permitting me for SDS I could not.
3. Right now I am living in India and applying visa from India itself. I have a Status of Overseas Citizen of India (OCI) proof of that also attached.
4. Proof of Financial Support- As I am a citizen of Mauritius I cannot open my GIC account in Recommended Banks on IRCC website.
My LOA does not mention the amount of tuition fees I have to deposit in the bank account of the university.
I communicated with the university representative but did not get a final answer. But the official says that you have to deposit the fees in August-2022 itself after registration.
Looking to this hunch I could not complete the payment of fees as well as assurance of living expenses in the form of GIC.
To provide evidence that I have sufficient funds available in my savings bank. I have prepared an EXPENSE SHEET and submitted it with the bank statement etc. showing financial capacity.

5. My father is stationed in Mauritius, and as a family we are all citizens of Mauritius. My Grandpa and other relatives live in India. I live with my grandpa in India. My Grandpa is bearing all my study expenses in Canada. I have produced all the types of requisite financial proof and an affidavit of financial support from him. Please take note of this.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It appears that your sentence or clause uses an incorrect form of the verb permitting. Consider changing it.
The phrase following the intransitive verb applying seems to be missing a preposition. Consider adding one.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It appears that the quantifier the amount does not fit with the countable noun fees. Consider changing the quantifier or the noun.
The noun phrase assurance seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase as a family. Consider adding a comma.
If you do not want Goyani to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
